title: Spectator Mode Constantly Sleeping Monitor
body:
Hello, 

I've been trying to play vicariously through a friend by spectating his games, but my monitor falls asleep after ~5 seconds of not moving the mouse. If I use the arrow keys to move around it falls asleep every ~5 seconds but restarts again. Has this happened to anyone before? I did a quick search and some people had similar problems but I never saw any resolution or how did they fix it.

Thanks

replies.body: The best way to stop that from happening is to probably adjust the sleep settings on your pc itself. League doesn't have any specific settings to cause your pc monitor to go to sleep.
This was the first thing I did. I turned off the sleep and monitor turn off entirely. It only happens when I go into spectator mode in the client.
